exploreMoreDescription: Discover our full range of premium vitamins and supplements
aboutContent: Highly effective Shilajit 1500 mg per vegan capsule - each capsule delivers the equivalent of 1500 mg (10:1 extract) of highest quality shilajit (Asphaltum Punjabianum). Shilajit resin from Himalayan regions is rich in natural compounds like fulvic acid, humic acid, and trace elements, traditionally used to support overall health and well-being. Our supplements are GMO free, GMP compliant, manufactured in certified facilities meeting strict EU/UK regulations. Includes a satisfaction guarantee.
descriptionContent: Nutriota Shilajit capsules provide a practical way to incorporate this natural substance derived from decomposed plant material in mountainous regions like the Himalayas. Known for its richness in organic compounds and minerals, Shilajit promotes vitality and general well-being. Our easy-to-take capsules offer a convenient solution for enjoying Shilajit benefits without the strong taste of raw resin. Each bottle contains 180 capsules (6-month supply) manufactured in a GMP compliant facility.
ingredientsContent: Filler (microcrystalline cellulose), shilajit extract 10:1, capsule shell (coating agent: hydroxypropylmethylcellulose), filler (dicalcium phosphate), release agent (stearic acid, magnesium salts of fatty acids, silicon dioxide).
informationContent: Units: 155.0 gram | Brand: Nutriota | Format: Capsule | Age Range Description: Adult
